Home » 17A10 Dasakanipātapāḷi » 4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 4.3 Sādhuvagga
4.3.2 Ariyadhammasutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Sādhuvagga
Ariyadhammasutta
179.
1324“Ariyadhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anariyadhammañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe…  katamo ca, bhikkhave, anariyo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe…  micchādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, anariyo dhammo.
1325Katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe…  sammādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo dhammo”ti.
1326Dutiyaṃ.
<< 4.3.1 Sādhusuttaup4.3.3 Kusalasutta >>
